details.top:
The following three Soorahs should be recited once after Zuhr, 'Asr and 'Ishaa prayers and thrice after the Fajr and Maghrib prayers.

1.Soorah al-Ikhlaas(112):
details.arabic_diacless:
﷽ 
قل هو اللٰه احد‌ ۚ‏﴿١﴾ اللٰه الصمد‌ ۚ‏﴿٢﴾ لم يلد ۙولم يولد ۙ‏﴿٣﴾ ولم يكن لهٗ كفوا احد ﴿٤﴾‏‏ ‏﻿
details.transliteration: Bismillaahir-Rahmaanir-Raheem. Qul Huwallaahu 'Ahad. Allaahus-Samad. Lam yalid wa lam yoolad. Wa lam yakun lahu kufuwan 'ahad.
details.translations: With the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. Say: He is Allah (the) One. The Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need, He begets not nor was He begotten, and there is none equal to Him

details.arabic_diacless:
﷽ 
قل اعوذ برب الفلقۙ‏ ﴿١﴾ من شر ما خلقۙ‏ ﴿٢﴾ ومن شر غاسق اذا وقبۙ‏ ﴿٣﴾ ومن شر النفٰثٰت فى العقدۙ‏ ﴿٤﴾ ومن شر حاسد اذا حسد ﴿٥﴾
details.arabic:
﷽ 
قُلۡ اَعُوۡذُ بِرَبِّ الۡفَلَقِۙ‏ ﴿١﴾ مِنۡ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَۙ‏ ﴿٢﴾ وَمِنۡ شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ اِذَا وَقَبَۙ‏ ﴿٣﴾ وَمِنۡ شَرِّ النَّفّٰثٰتِ فِى الۡعُقَدِۙ‏ ﴿٤﴾ وَمِنۡ شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ اِذَا حَسَدَ ﴿٥﴾
details.transliteration: Bismillaahir-Rahmaanir-Raheem. Qul 'a'oo<u>th</u>u birabbil-falaq. Min sharri maa khalaq. Wa min sharri ghaasiqin 'i<u>th</u>aa waqab. Wa min sharrin-naffaathaati fil-'uqad. Wa min sharri haasidin 'i<u>th</u>aa hasad.
details.translations: With the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. Say: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of the daybreak, from the evil of what He has created, and from the evil of the darkening (night) as it comes with its darkness, and from the evil of those who practice witchcraft when they blow in the knots, and from the evil of the envier when he envies.

details.arabic_diacless:
﷽ 
قل اعوذ برب الناسۙ‏ ﴿١﴾ ملك الناسۙ‏ ﴿٢﴾ الٰه الناسۙ‏ ﴿٣﴾ من شر الوسواس ۙ الخـناس ۙ‏﴿٤﴾ الذى يوسوس فى صدور الناسۙ‏ ﴿٥﴾ من الجنة والناس ﴿٦﴾
details.arabic:
﷽ 
قُلۡ اَعُوۡذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِۙ‏ ﴿١﴾ مَلِكِ النَّاسِۙ‏ ﴿٢﴾ اِلٰهِ النَّاسِۙ‏ ﴿٣﴾ مِنۡ شَرِّ الۡوَسۡوَاسِ ۙ الۡخَـنَّاسِ ۙ‏﴿٤﴾ الَّذِىۡ يُوَسۡوِسُ فِىۡ صُدُوۡرِ النَّاسِۙ‏ ﴿٥﴾ مِنَ الۡجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ ﴿٦﴾
details.transliteration: Bismillaahir-Rahmaanir-Raheem. Qul 'a'oo<u>th</u>u birabbin-naas. Malikin-naas. 'Ilaahin-naas. Min sharril-waswaasil-khannaas. Alla<u>th</u>ee yuwaswisu fee sudoorin-naas. Minal-jinnati wannaas.
details.translations: With the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. Say: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of mankind, the King of mankind, the God of mankind, from the evil of the whisperer who withdraws, who whispers in the breasts of mankind, of jinns and men.
details.reference: Abu Dawud 2/86, An-Nasa'i 3/68. See also Al-Albani, SahihAt-Tirmithi 2/8.

pageTitle: Last three Surahs of the Quran
